channel.title: Please help me i need to know how to make myself owner/admin in nrs3 718 rsps
channel.description: please help me ive tried making myself admin/owner in nrs3 server 718/732 rsps, and i changed my name by ("admin") in commands.java and also in player.java i checked both areas i still dont get admin/owner, i tried everything someone please help me thanks alot..

item.title: Please help me i need to know how to make myself owner/admin in nrs3 718 rsps
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

Search for:

username + ", pass: " + password);

under it add:

		if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME"))
            {
            rights = 2;
			}

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me i need to know how to make myself owner/admin in nrs3 718 rsps

item.source: Please help me i need to know how to make myself owner/admin in nrs3 718 rsps

item.title: Please help me i need to know how to make myself owner/admin in nrs3 718 rsps
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

[quote=“noty, post:2, topic:483009”][size=13pt][center]For 701+[/center]

Source -> Src -> Org -> Dementhium -> Model -> Player -> PlayerUpdate.java

CTRL + F -> Administrator / Owner Name -> Something like this will come up:

if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE")) { appearanceData.writeRS2String("<img=1><b><col=cc0000>Administrator</col></b> "+Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername())); }

  1. This will change your:
  • Yell title.
  • You’ll get Administrator / Moderator permissions.
  • A crown behind your name.

[size=13pt][center]For 317+ [/center]

Source - Characters - Choose Character you want to edit.

Should look like this:

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = test
character-password = test

BankPin = true
bankPin1 = 1
bankPin2 = 2
bankPin3 = 3
bankPin4 = 4

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3092
character-posy = 3508
character-rights = 3[/code]

  1. This will give you:
  • Administrator / Moderator permissions.
  • Crown / title behind your name.[/quote] i tried that nothing ? it doesnt work still

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me i need to know how to make myself owner/admin in nrs3 718 rsps

@noty wrote:

[size=13pt][center]For 701+[/center]

Source -> Src -> Org -> Dementhium -> Model -> Player -> PlayerUpdate.java

CTRL + F -> Administrator / Owner Name -> Something like this will come up:

if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE")) { appearanceData.writeRS2String("<img=1><b><col=cc0000>Administrator</col></b> "+Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername())); }

  1. This will change your:
  • Yell title.

[size=13pt][center]For 317+ [/center]

Source - Characters - Choose Character you want to edit.

Should look like this:

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = test
character-password = test

BankPin = true

bankPin3 = 3
bankPin4 = 4

[CHARACTER]

  • Administrator / Moderator permissions.
  • Crown / title behind your name.
